title: BILTIR 2015 Co-Sponsored Breakfast
text:
Life Insurance and Reinsurance Experts, LOGiQ³, msg global solutions, and TAI to Co-Sponsor at 2015 Bermuda International Life and Annuity ConferenceAttendees of the 2015 Bermuda International Life and Annuity Conference are invited to network over breakfast co-sponsored by LOGiQ³, msg global and TAI.
Toronto, ON/Bermuda
Life insurance and reinsurance experts, LOGiQ³ and msg global solutions, and their joint venture subsidiary TAI, the North American market leader of life reinsurance systems, will be in attendance at this year’s Bermuda International Life and Annuity Conference, to be held in at The Fairmont Southampton, in Bermuda on Tuesday, September 29th. The conference will be hosted by the Bermuda International Long Term Insurers and Reinsurers (BILTIR), an association that represents 46 member companies, providing the long term insurance industry a consistent and coherent voice in Bermuda.
Attendees are invited to join the opening networking breakfast which will be co-sponsored by LOGiQ³, msg global, and TAI.
There has been a notable increase in registration for this year’s conference with attendees coming to the island from across North America and Europe, along with many Bermuda-based executives. The conference will cover the January 2016 implementation of Solvency II, and Bermuda’s concurrent efforts of modernizing its capital and solvency framework to maintain its highly regarded regulatory standards. Attendees will also hear from leading industry experts on a host of other key topics related to the long-term insurance sector. Highlights include a presentation by the President of the Society of Actuaries, an organization that has more than 25,000 members in 78 countries. In addition, there will a special session on the future of living longer and a panel discussion with leading Bermuda reinsurance CEOs. To view the complete conference agenda or to register, visit http://events.biltir.com .
Co-Founder of LOGiQ³, Chris Murumets, who attended and spoke at the first annual conference, comments: “BILTIR was an absolute highlight for me. The content was very well planned, the meeting was incredibly well organized and I was able to participate in many great conversations during the networking opportunities at the event. It definitely didn’t feel like it was their first year running!””
Scott Selkirk, the Chair of BILTIR’s Strategy Committee and Head Pricing Actuary of Weisshorn Re Ltd also comments, “Bermuda is recognized as a global center for innovative risk management solutions. This conference is an ideal opportunity to learn how that innovation is taking shape in the life and annuity reinsurance market.”
For full details on The Bermuda International Life and Annuity Conference, visit: http://events.biltir.bm/

About LOGiQ³
LOGiQ³ is the expert provider of life insurance and reinsurance consulting and outsourced services. LOGiQ³ delivers long-term strategic solutions and short-term tactical support across Distribution, Underwriting, Reinsurance Administration, Claims and Audit. LOGiQ³ supports clients across the life insurance service chain from agent to retrocessionaire from its offices in Toronto, Canada, and Cardiff, UK. To learn more about LOGiQ³, visit http://www.logiq3.com
About msg global solutions
msg global solutions is a product- and solutions-based systems integrator that serves insurers and reinsurers in all lines of business, in all regions of the world. Our expert teams employ a complete selection of consulting services and software products to help large and mid-size clients succeed with a range of business and IT strategies, including digital transformation.
msg global solutions is part of msg group, an independent, international group of companies with autonomous regional companies and subsidiaries and well over 4,500 employees worldwide. msg offers a holistic service spectrum of creative, strategic consulting and intelligent, sustainable and value-added IT solutions and has acquired an excellent reputation as an industry specialist during its more than 30 years in business. msg holds seventh place in the ranking of IT consulting and system integration companies in Germany. To learn more about msg global solutions, visit http://www.msg-global.com
About Tindall Associates (TAI)
Based outside Chicago, TAI offers a complete software solution for life insurance companies to self-report all their reinsurance information; assumed, ceded or retroceded, in an electronic format to share with trading partners on a cost-effective basis. To learn more about TAI, visit http://www.taire.com
About BILTIR
Bermuda International Long Term Insurers and Reinsurers (BILTIR) was created to serve as a formal association representing the long-term insurer and reinsurer group in Bermuda. The primary focus of BILTIR is to be an advocate for the life industry on the island for matters with respect to regulatory requirements and other aspects with the Bermuda Monetary Authority, tax matters with various jurisdictions and in general to provide a consistent and coherent voice for any concerns of the life industry in Bermuda. To learn more about BILTIR, visit http://www.biltir.bm/
